description:
Giroro`s humiliated when he comes across some old footage of him insisting he would never fall in love with a lady soldier on the other side.  He decides that, no matter how he feels about Natsumi, he has to conquer the Earth right away!  But then Natsumi gets sick, and he`s forced to re-evaluate where his priorities lie.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: April une guerrière malade / Il faut sauver April
Natsumi Kounetsu no Chikyuu Senshi de Arimasu / Giroro Ore ga Yaraneba Dare ga Yaru de Arimasu
夏美 高熱の地球戦士 であります / ギロロ 俺がやらねば誰がやる であります
